options.name: Llama3.1 70b Instruct
options.description: Llama3.1 70b Instruct from watsonx.ai. A powerful general-purpose language model suitable for a wide range of tasks.

options.name: Mixtral 8x7b Instruct
options.description: Mixtral-8x7B Large Language Model (LLM) is a pretrained generative Sparse Mixture of Experts. Outperforms Llama 2 70B on most benchmarks. Suitable for complex reasoning and diverse tasks.

options.name: OpenAI GPT4o
options.description: Team defined model for Azure OpenAI GPT4o. Advanced language model with strong performance across various domains.

options.name: Llama3 8B Instruct
options.description: watsonx challenge Llama3 8B instruct from watsonx.ai. Smaller but efficient model for general-purpose tasks.

options.name: OpenAI GPT4 32K
options.description: Team defined model for Azure OpenAI GPT4 32k tokens. Capable of handling very long contexts and complex tasks.

options.name: OpenAI GPT 3.5
options.description: Team defined model for Azure OpenAI GPT 3.5 Turbo with streaming output and contextual history. Fast and efficient for many general-purpose tasks.

options.name: Claude 2 (100K)
options.description: Anthropic Claude v2 via Amazon Bedrock. Advanced language model with a very large context window, suitable for complex and lengthy tasks.

options.name: Mixtral Large
options.description: Mistral Large is a large language model developed by Mistral Al. Fluent in multiple languages and effective for programmatic tasks and RAG use cases.

options.name: Granite 13B V2.1
options.description: Decoder-only transformer model for general use. Optimized for dialogue use cases.

options.name: Granite 34B Code Instruct V2
options.description: Open source Granite 34b Code Instruct model from IBM watsonx and IBM Research. Specialized for code-related tasks and instructions.

options.name: Granite 20b Multilingual
options.description: A foundation model from the IBM Granite family. Trained for English, German, Spanish, French, and Portuguese. Suitable for closed-domain question answering, summarization, generation, extraction, and classification in these languages.

options.name: Generate Java Code
options.description: Specialized assistant for generating Java code and solving programming problems.

options.name: IBM Form 10k
options.description: Collection of IBM financial documents including Form 10k for information retrieval and analysis.
